awards and fellowships.title: Chevron Energy Fellowship 2024-25
awards and fellowships.summary: The Chevron Fellowship supports PhD graduate research students focused on energy research. The Chevron Fellowship is part of the companyâ€™s University Partnership Program, which supports universities around the country by providing the necessary funding to better develop the future of the energy business. Fellowship awardees will be able to access Chevron stakeholders for industry perspective on their research topics.
